name: Death Is Just The Beginning (RockinJammy)
description:
Death Is Just the Beginning  Entry into the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam! by JammySoft. Download Instructions

Download the Zip File "Death.zip".

Unpack Death.zip.

Find the executable Death/Death.exe.

Double Click Death.exe to run game.

Keys

Mouse to look,   WASD to move,   `Shift` To Run   and   `esc` to quit game.

GamePlay

Find a Soul, Take it to the Altar, you can only carry one at a time.

Avoid Scary Demons - One touch and you are dead.

Take all Souls to the altar to complete level.

Can you complete all 12 levels ?

Credits

Thanks to GameDev.tv for some excellent tutorials and this game Jam.

Thanks to The Game Creators for the amazing AGK Development environment and language.

All media and code created by Jammy for this jam and can be used by anyone for anything.  though credit would be nice.

Source Code is included though be warned it is very messy.

Good luck and have fun.

Let me know what you think !
